Model

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents question that is asked to players.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String answer
      Text of the answer.
      protected java.lang.String notes
      Text of the notes.
      protected int price
      Price of the question.
      protected java.lang.String text
      Text of the question.
      protected java.lang.String topic
      Topic of the question.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Question(int price, java.lang.String topic, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String answer, java.lang.String notes)
      Constructs a player with specified price, topic and text.

    • Field Detail

      • price

        protected int price
        Price of the question. Can be added to/subtracted from the score of the player who has answered the question

      • topic

        protected java.lang.String topic
        Topic of the question. Number of questions of each topic during the game should be the same.

      • text

        protected java.lang.String text
        Text of the question.

      • answer

        protected java.lang.String answer
        Text of the answer.

      • notes

        protected java.lang.String notes
        Text of the notes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(int price,
                java.lang.String topic,
                java.lang.String text,
                java.lang.String answer,
                java.lang.String notes)
        Constructs a player with specified price, topic and text.
        Parameters:
        price - the value of the price of the constricted Question.
        topic - the topic of the constricted Question.
        text - the text of the constricted Question.
